Aeon Labs Gen6 Multi-Sensor¶

Aeotec by Aeon Labs ZW100 Multisensor, Small, White¶

Specification¶

  • Model number: ZW100
  • Power Supply: USB DC 5V or battery power(2×CR123A batteries, 3V, 1500mAh)
  • Operating Temperature: 0 C to 40 C .
  • Measured Temperature Range: -10 C to 50 C . Accuracy: ±0.5 C .
  • Humidity Range: 20%RH to 80%RH. Accuracy: ±5%RH (at 25 C ).
  • Lighting: 0 LUX to 1000 LUX.
  • Motion Sensitivity: 3 meters to 5 meters.
  • Water Proofing: IP20.
  • Wireless Range: Up to 500feet/150 metres outdoors.

Inclusion/Exclusion to/from a network¶

  1. Put controller to Inclusion/Exclusion mode
  2. Press program button once. Device will be included/excluded to/from zwave network.

Wake up information¶

  • When battery is used, to wake up device, press and hold its Z-Wave Button for 3 seconds and then release it. Your MultiSensor’s LED should now be solid to indicate that it is active.
  • When completing configurating or communicating with device, to put device into sleep mode for battery saving, press and hold its Z-Wave Button for 3 seconds and then release it.
  • When power-supply is used, device is in waken up state always.

Factory reset¶

Press and hold z-wave button for 20 seconds and then release. LED will stay in solid for 2 seconds and then turn off indicates reset successfully.

Button pressed actions and events¶

Short 1 time pressed
  1. Send non-secure node info frame
    1. Add device to z-wave network
    2. Remove device from z-wave network
Short 2 times pressed in 1 seconds Send secure node info frame
Press and hold 3 seconds Enable/disable wake up for 10 minutes
Press and hold 20 seconds Reset device to factory setting

Link in Amazon¶

https://www.amazon.com/Aeotec-Multisensor-temperature-humidity-vibration/dp/B0151Z8ZQY

Configuration description¶

  1. Enable wake-up device 10 minutes after re-power on (battery mode)

    • Parameter: 2 (0x02)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:

      0x00: disable others: enable

    • Default: 0x00

  2. Auto clear motion interval

    • Parameter: 3 (0x03)

    • Size: 2 bytes

    • Value: 1 ~ 15300

      • 1 ~ 255: unit is second

      • 256 ~ 15300: unit is minute with below formular
        1. interval = value/60 (without remainder)
        2. interval = value/60 + 1 (if remainder)

    • Default: 0x00F0

  3. Motion sensity

    • Parameter: 4 (0x04)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:
      • 0x00: disable
      • 0x01: sensity minimum level
      • 0x02:
      • 0x03: sensity medium level
      • 0x04
      • 0x05: sensity maximum level

    • Default: 5

  4. Motion trigger command

    • Parameter: 5 (0x05)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:
      • 0x01: Basic set CC
      • 0x02: Sensor binary report

    • Default: 1

  5. Configure low battery value

    • Parameter: 39 (0x27)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:
      • Valid value: 10 ~ 50
      • Unit percentage

    • Default: 20

  6. Enable auto report when temperature and humidity change reach to threshold

    • Parameter: 40 (0x28)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:
      • 0x00: disable this feature
      • 0x01: enable this feature

    • Default: 0

  7. Temperature change threshold to send report

    • Parameter: 41 (0x29)

    • Size: 2 bytes

    • Value:
      • Unit is Farenheit for US version and Celsius for EU/AU version
      • High byte is threshold value. low byte is unit (0x01-celsius, 0x02=farenheit)
      • Threshold value contains 1 decimal point, eg: threshold = 20, it means 2.0. setting value 0x1401 means that 2.0 oC

    • Default: 0x14xx

  8. Humidity change threshold to send report

    • Parameter: 42 (0x2A)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:
      • Unit is percentage
      • Valid value: 0x01 ~ 0x64

    • Default: 0x0A

  9. Luminance change threshold to send report
    • Parameter: 43 (0x2B)
    • Size: 2 bytes
    • Value: in range
    • Default: 0x0064
  10. Battery change

    • Parameter: 44 (0x2C)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:
      • Unit is percentage
      • Valid value: 0x01 ~ 0x64

    • Default: 0x0A

  11. Ultraviolet change
    • Parameter: 45 (0x2D)
    • Size: 1 byte
    • Value: in range
    • Default: 0x02
  12. Low temperature threshold report

    • Parameter: 46 (0x2E)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:
      • 0x00: disable
      • 0x01: enable

    • Default: 0x00

  13. Report items to group 1

    • Parameter: 101 (0x65)

    • Size: 4 bytes

    • Value: bit setting
      • bit 0: battery
      • bit 4: ultra-violet
      • bit 5: temperature
      • bit 6: humidity
      • bit 7: luminance

    • Default: 0x000000F1

  14. Auto report interval

    • Parameter: 111 (0x6F)

    • Size: 4 bytes

    • Value:
      • Valid value: 0x05-0x28DE80
      • USB power, unit is second
      • Battery power: value <= X*60, interval is X minutes

    • Default: 0x00000E10 (3600 seconds)
